summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica’s Magnetic[+] Afterglow Cleanser refreshes and leaves a lasting glow. With Phyto Mucin Blend and Lotus Root Extract, it acts like a magnet to attract and retain moisture, setting the stage for radiant, healthy skin and enhancing your skincare routine.
details: DetailsBenefitsRefreshing cleanse leaves a lasting glowDeposits long-lasting hydration + nutrientsRenews + revitalizes skin dailyKey IngredientsCleansing murumuru butter and oatPhyto mucin blend with lotus root extract and 10% glycerinCellular hydrabond technology with positively-charged hyaluronic acidResearch Results92% felt their skin was hydrated and nourished after cleansing95% felt their skin was softer after cleansing92% said this cleanser was gentle yet effective*Consumer perception based on internal 3-day study of 38 subjects, 2 uses/dayItem 2638668How To UseMassage onto dampened face and neck. Rinse with warm water.Keep out of eyes. Stop using if you experience redness or itching.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Lauryl Glucoside, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Decyl Glucoside, Polyglyceryl-3 Distearate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oleosomes, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Jasminum Sambac (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Gardenia Jasminoides Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Nelumbo Nucifera Root Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Oil, Tocopherol, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino Acids, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Gluconate, Glyceryl Oleate, Pentylene Glycol, Palmitic Acid, Saccharide Isomerate, 2,3-Butanediol, Maltodextrin, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Coco-Glucoside, Titanium Dioxide, Sodium Astrocaryum Murumuruate, Gluconolactone, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Propanediol, Cellulose Gum, Stearic Acid, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Sorbic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene, Linalool.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Massage onto dampened face and neck. Rinse with warm water.Keep out of eyes. Stop using if you experience redness or itching.

reviews.headline: Best cleanser ever
reviews.comments: I have dry rosecea prone skin and usually use their UltraCalming cleanser. However, I needed a slightly stronger cleanser for summer/post workout sweat so I picked this up on a whim. It smells fantastic and makes my skin look and feel fabulous. It effectively cleans off all of the days gunk and sweat, yet doesn't irritate or dry my skin. This cleanser is so pricey, but my goodness is it amazing.

reviews.headline: Yes!
reviews.comments: Ok I know the price is scary to look at but wow after using this the first time my face felt like I just spent 100$ on a facial. It deep cleans so well but over some time I noticed my skin looking more even and less blotchy! Gifted by dermatology

reviews.headline: Good!
reviews.comments: Gifted by dermalogica. It has a very nice gentle texture, and it suds up nicely. It left my face feeling so clean without making my skin feel tight. I do use a separate oil cleanser for makeup removal as i have found in the past i get acne from not completely getting makeup removed, so i cannot say how it does with removing makeup. I love it so fat!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser the ingredients are incredible and it not only cleanses my face it leaves it feeling smooth and soft with no tight feeling. I do see a gradual glow after I've been using this cleanser! Gifted by dermalogica

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This cleanser is one of my new favorites! I love how it lathers up and it smells really nice. I keep it in my shower and I love how it isn't drying of my skin! Going to be using this daily. Gifted by dermAlogica

I've been loving this new cleanser kindly gifted by Dermalogica! The texture is incredibly soft and creamy it feels luxurious on the skin and creates such a soothing experience, especially in the mornings. The scent is light and refreshing, which makes it a perfect pick-me-up to start the day. After using it, my skin feels clean but never stripped just soft, balanced, and deeply nourished. It really helps to calm any sensitivity or dryness I might have, and it leaves my skin feeling smooth, hydrated, and visibly more radiant. I've noticed that my makeup goes on so much better afterward because my skin is properly prepped.

reviews.headline: Great for my dry skin
reviews.comments: Gifted by dermalogica. I'm not sure I quite understand what's magnetic about this cleanser, but I do know it works well for my dry skin! It hardly lathers at all. Instead, it creates an almost slippery feeling on my face, leaving my skin clean yet hydrated. It has a creamy texture, pale blue color, and almost no scent, just a light and clean citrus aroma.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This cleanser is very nice and refreshing loving it in my skin. It hydrates and smooth my skin and it leaves my skin really nice and soft. And instantly gives my skin a nice glow. It's great on my sensitive skin.. It's very nourishing it lathers very nicely. Gifted by Dermalogica

reviews.headline: Glowing skin
reviews.comments:
This cleanser is a game-changer! It's super gentle but still gets rid of all the dirt and makeup without leaving my skin dry. My face feels so soft and hydrated after using it, and there's this glow that's just chef's kiss. It's like a mini spa moment every time I wash my face. Totally worth it!
Gifted by  Dermalogica Glowing skin

reviews.headline: Effective
reviews.comments: The texture is silky and smooth, and it spreads nicely across the skin. It has a mild, fresh scent that isn't overpowering. After using it for about a week, I noticed my skin felt softer and looked a bit brighter, especially in the mornings. It didn't dry me out or leave any residue.

reviews.headline: Brighter skin
reviews.comments: I really enjoy using this. Dermalogica is always a trustworthy brand and I've used many of their products and this one is gonna go on rotation for me. I do feel like my skin seems brighter and I get more of that healthy glow after using. I do think that this one is great for dull dry skin like mine Gifted by Dermalogica

reviews.headline: My new favorite
reviews.comments: I've been using this Cleanser for over a week now and it's already become a favorite in my skincare routine. It has a rich, hydrating formula that cleanses without stripping my skin. Love the ingredients like Murumuru Seed Butter and Oat. What really stood out to me was the Phyto Mucin Blend and positively charged Hyaluronic Acid—my skin feels and looks more hydrated and smooth after each use. Perfect for anyone with dry or balanced skin looking for a cleanser that actually nourishes while it cleans. Gifted by Dermalogica

reviews.headline: Fabulous clean + glowy feeling!
reviews.comments: I WAS NOT gifted this product by Dermalogica, but did purchase it because of all of the positive reviews. I find that my skincare routine is enhanced by this cleanser. My serums/moisturizers absorb into my skin better because of this product. I love the smell and consistency and tend to use it with my Foreo facial device for that extra clean glow. A little bit goes a long way too!

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: The face wash was wonderful. It left my skin feeling soft and hydrated. It did a good job of cleansing my face. My face was glowing after. It did not strip my skin or leave it feeling dry. It works best day and night. Complimentary from dermalogica

reviews.headline: The best facial cleanser
reviews.comments: Complimentary from Dermalogica . I love this cleanser ! It gets the job done so well and has my skin feeling fresh ,soft ,glowy,and hydrated . I use this morning and night . All you need is one pump worth and it's enough to wash your face ,neck ,and chest ! It breaks down everything from dirt,sebum,stubborn makeup ,the list goes on . I really enjoy how gentle this is on my dry skin as well ! Some of the ingredients that I am loving in this have to be hyaluronic acid ,murumuru butter and oat ! I definitely recommend to all especially if you struggle with dull dry skin .

reviews.headline: Gentle for my skin
reviews.comments: After using this product for a few days, I've noticed that it leaves my skin soft and hydrated. It doesn't require immediate moisturizer after use. I've tried it on my sensitive skin, and it's incredibly gentle. I use it in the morning, and I've definitely noticed an improvement in my skin's hydration. Gifted by dermalogica

reviews.headline: deeply hydrated
reviews.comments: This cleanser is a hydration game-changer! It feels luxurious and leaves my skin incredibly refreshed, never tight or stripped. The real magic is the lasting glow and plumpness – it truly acts like a magnet for moisture. My skin looks revitalized and feels deeply hydrated thanks to the Phyto Mucin and glycerin. It sets the perfect, radiant stage for the rest of my skincare. Worth every penny for that healthy afterglow! Giftedby Dermalogica

reviews.headline: Nourishing
reviews.comments: This product was gifted by Dermalogica in exchange for my honest review. I've been wanting to try this cleanser! After using this cleanser my skin feels so soft and hydrated. I also like the fact that it's a pump because it's easier to dispense.

reviews.headline: Glowy Skin
reviews.comments: This cleanser feels so refreshing and leaves my skin with the prettiest glow. The texture is silky, and it makes my face feel hydrated and smooth, never tight or dry. I love how it preps my skin for the rest of my routine. Gifted by Dermalogica

reviews.headline: Love!!!
reviews.comments: Obsessed. The Dermalogica Magnetic Afterglow Cleanser became a fave instantly. It seriously feels like a mini spa night at home….super luxe but not too heavy. The texture is buttery and melts right into your skin, taking off makeup and grime so easily without making your face feel dry or tight. It's giving clean and glowy. Gifted by Dermalogica.

Gentle and safe for all skin types

media.headline: Skin feels cleansed and refreshed! Gentle & Effective
media.caption: Great for Aging skin!

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been using the Magnetic Afterglow Cleanser for about a week, and I absolutely love the sensory experience it provides. The creamy texture feels luxuriousâ€"almost like a moisturizer rather than a typical cleanserâ€"which makes washing my face feel like a self-care ritual. It glides beautifully on the skin and does a great job of cleansing without leaving it feeling stripped or tight. After rinsing, my skin feels incredibly soft and smooth, and I've noticed that my other skincare products apply more effortlessly afterward. That said, I haven't experienced the â€œafterglowâ€ effect that's advertised. While my skin feels nourished, it doesn't look particularly radiant or glowy right after cleansing. In fact, it looks a bit dull until I follow up with a moisturizer. I appreciate that it's gentle and non-drying, but I was hoping for a more visibly luminous finish post-cleanse. Overall, it's a lovely product for texture and hydration, but if you're looking for an immediate glow, this might fall a bit short. Gifted by dermalogica
faceoff_positive.headline: Creamy and Comforting, But Missing the Glow

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this product in exchange for honest review gifted by dermalogica! Honestly this product didn't seem to do much for me. The packaging design is nice and clean but the cap you push down to get the product out wobbles it's a little unstable. I like the consistency of the product and how a little goes a long way but my face (which is typically dry skin) didn't really feel different before and after. The smell is also okay, it's like a mixture of like a minty pine freshish smell? I can't pinpoint it. I like it it's just different. I probably wouldn't recommend as I didn't see much of a difference in my skin hydration or appearance after using for 2 weeks. It did get my makeup off though!
faceoff_negative.headline: Just okay
